options.description: Set frame size. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Default value is "640x480".
options.name: size

options.description: Set frame rate, expressed as number of frames per second. Default value is "25".
options.name: rate

options.description: Set 8 colors. Default values for colors is to pick random one.
options.name: c0

options.description: Set 8 colors. Default values for colors is to pick random one.
options.name: c1

options.description: Set 8 colors. Default values for colors is to pick random one.
options.name: c2

options.description: Set 8 colors. Default values for colors is to pick random one.
options.name: c3

options.description: Set 8 colors. Default values for colors is to pick random one.
options.name: c4

options.description: Set 8 colors. Default values for colors is to pick random one.
options.name: c5

options.description: Set 8 colors. Default values for colors is to pick random one.
options.name: c6

options.description: Set 8 colors. Default values for colors is to pick random one.
options.name: c7

options.description: Set gradient line source and destination points. If negative or out of range, random ones are picked.
options.name: x0

options.description: Set gradient line source and destination points. If negative or out of range, random ones are picked.
options.name: y0

options.description: Set gradient line source and destination points. If negative or out of range, random ones are picked.
options.name: y1

options.description: Set number of colors to use at once. Allowed range is from 2 to 8. Default value is 2.
options.name: nb_colors

options.description: Set seed for picking gradient line points.
options.name: seed

options.description:
Set the duration of the sourced video. See (ffmpeg-utils)the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax.

If not specified, or the expressed duration is negative, the video is supposed to be generated forever.
options.name: duration

options.description:
Set type of gradients. Available values are:

‘linear’
‘radial’
‘circular’
‘spiral’
‘square’

Default type is linear.
options.name: type
